price: Huko utapigwa ukelele mmoja tu! Na hapo ndio wataona!
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَإِذَا هُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ
footnotes: Kwani hakika kufufuliwa ni Ukelele mmoja tu, mara wote watakuwa wahai wakiyaona waliyo ahidiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā hiya zajratun wāḥidatun fa-idhā hum yanẓurūna
